title: Do Psychedelics Help Us Connect To God? Responding to Mikhaila Peterson | Unapologetic 93
itunes:title: Do Psychedelics Help Us Connect To God? Responding to Mikhaila Peterson | Unapologetic 93
description: Mikhaila Peterson, Jordan Peterson's daughter, claimed that hallucinogens helped her connect to God and that they played an instrumental role in her journey to Christianity. What does the Bible say about drugs, and what role, if any, do they play in experiencing God?
